/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV008QMapper.selectLoadSttcList */
SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'세입징수액계산서' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'분기' AS STTC_TIT3 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 ,'0' AS ROW_KND_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'지출계산서(관서운영경비 포함)' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'월' AS STTC_TIT3 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 ,'1' AS ROW_KND_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'국유재산 등 기타' AS STTC_TIT2 ,'월/분기/연' AS STTC_TIT3 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 ,'2' AS ROW_KND_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) AS AUD_YR ,TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1),0,4)) || '년' AS STTC_TIT1 ,'합계' AS STTC_TIT2 ,' ' AS STTC_TIT3 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL1 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL2 ,TO_NUMBER('0') AS STTC_COL3 ,'3' AS ROW_KND_CD FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT T2.AUD_YR ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_TIT2 ,T2.STTC_TIT3 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,T2.ROW_KND_CD FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '008' AND T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(T3.STTC_TYP_SEQ) FROM TWFAACAV200M T3 WHERE T3.STTC_CLSF_CD = '008' AND T3.STTC_DTM_DY IS NOT NULL) AND T2.AUD_YR BETWEEN SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -61),0,4) AND SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt},-13),0,4)

/* kr.go.bai.eip.aep.arp.dao.FAACAV008QMapper.selectSttcList */ SELECT T1.RMK ,T1.ADM_OPIN ,TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_PROD_STAD_DY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_DTM_DY IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS STTC_DTM_YN ,T2.STTC_TYP_CD ,T2.STTC_CLSF_CD ,T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ,T2.STTC_DATA_SNO ,T2.STTC_TIT1 ,T2.STTC_TIT2 ,T2.STTC_TIT3 ,T2.STTC_COL1 ,T2.STTC_COL2 ,T2.STTC_COL3 ,CASE WHEN T1.STTC_YR -1 > T2.AUD_YR THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END VIEW_YN ,T2.AUD_YR ,T2.ROW_KND_CD ,NVL(TO_CHAR(T1.STTC_DTM_DY,'YYYY"-"MM"-"DD'),'미확정') AS STTC_DTM_DY FROM TWFAACAV200M T1 INNER JOIN TWFAACAV200D T2 ON ( T1.STTC_TYP_CD = T2.STTC_TYP_CD AND T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = T2.STTC_CLSF_CD AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = T2.STTC_TYP_SEQ ) WHERE T1.STTC_CLSF_CD = '008' AND T1.STTC_TYP_SEQ = #{sttcTypSeq} ORDER BY STTC_DATA_SNO

/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV008QMapper.insertMaster */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200M ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_YR ,STTC_STR_MON ,STTC_END_MON ,STTC_PROD_STAD_DY ,STTC_DTM_DY ,RMK ,ADM_OPIN ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '10' ,'008' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '008' ) ,SUBSTR(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1), 0, 4) ,'01' ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(#{proStadDt}, -1)), 'MM') ,#{proStadDt} ,'' ,#{rmk} ,#{admOpin} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )

/* kr.go.bai.eip.faa.cav.dao.FAACAV008QMapper.insertDetail */
INSERT INTO TWFAACAV200D ( STTC_TYP_CD ,STTC_CLSF_CD ,STTC_TYP_SEQ ,STTC_DATA_SNO ,STTC_TIT1 ,STTC_TIT2 ,STTC_TIT3 ,STTC_COL1 ,STTC_COL2 ,STTC_COL3 ,AUD_YR ,ROW_KND_CD ,FRT_USR_ID ,FNL_USR_ID ,FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD ,FNL_MNU_ID ,FRT_REGI_DH ,FNL_MDF_DH ) VALUES ( '10' ,'008' ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '008' ) ,( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_DATA_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM TWFAACAV200D WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '008' AND STTC_TYP_SEQ = ( SELECT NVL(MAX(STTC_TYP_SEQ), 0) FROM TWFAACAV200M WHERE STTC_TYP_CD = '10' AND STTC_CLSF_CD = '008' )) ,#{sttcTit1} ,#{sttcTit2} ,#{sttcTit3} ,#{sttcCol1} ,#{sttcCol2} ,#{sttcCol3} ,#{audYr} ,#{rowKndCd} ,#{usrId} ,#{usrId} ,#{dptCd} ,#{mnuId} ,SYSDATE ,SYSDATE )
